factoryName.metadata: データ ファクトリ名

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	df_db_username as string,
	df_db_password as string,
	df_db_table_name as string
}
source(output(
		empId as short,
		{ name} as string,
		{ gendar} as string,
		{ age} as short,
		{ mail} as string,
		{ phoneNo} as string,
		{ salary} as integer,
		{ department} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empSource
empSource filter(notEquals({ department}, 3)) ~> filterHrOut
filterHrOut sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		emp_id as integer,
		emp_name as string,
		gender as integer,
		age as integer,
		mail_address as string,
		phone_no as string,
		salary as integer,
		dep_id as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> inserttossdb

source(output(
		depId as short,
		depName as string,
		managerEmpId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DeptSource
source(output(
		empId as short,
		{ name} as string,
		{ gendar} as string,
		{ age} as short,
		{ mail} as string,
		{ phoneNo} as string,
		{ salary} as integer,
		{ department} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmptSource
DeptSource, EmptSource join(depId == { department},
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmptDept
JoinEmptDept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dept_righ_join_emp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		depId,
		depName,
		managerEmpId,
		empId,
		{ name},
		{ gendar},
		{ age},
		{ mail},
		{ phoneNo},
		{ salary},
		{ department}
	)) ~> Output
